Filo_Tag.title: Filo Tag - Bluetooth Tracker
Filo_Tag.short_description:
The loudest Bluetooth tracker yet.
Improved Sound and Range. In 4 stylish colors.
Compatible with iPhone and Android.

specifications.features_3: Set “comfort zone” with quick notification if separated from track item.
specifications.size_0: 25 mm x 41 mm x 5 mm (0.98 in x 1.61 in x 0.19 in)
specifications.compatibility_0: Compatible with iOS 9 and later, and devices running Android 4.4 and later.
specifications.compatibility_1: See full list of officially supported devices.
